description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Iris is an intuitive Media Player and Music Visualizer for your Xbox 360.  It features 10 unique customizable music visualizers, along with access to your Media Library on your Xbox 360 and on your Windows PC using Windows Media Connect.  Pick your favorite songs, then sit back and enjoy the show.  Now with 5 iRiS 2.0 visualizers included!
